samples.question: [Transcript chunk 1]
samples.transcript: Foreign good morning good morning welcome to IBM IELTS Academy this is the speaking section of your IELTS test it may take about 15 minutes and I will ask you some questions in three parts is that okay yes sure examiner is Sarah Parker examiner number is 23589 candidate is bunny and candidate's number is 13594 but all my relatives and friends call me Ellie so call me Ellie okay I miss your ID card yeah sure thank you here we go it is a Asian country and somehow it is a historical country and I live in a big city that is located in the middle of the country and it is fun okay yes active work or study and somehow both of them I work as a med rep for an Iranian company in part-time and in the other hand I work I study in master and sometimes sometimes in my leisure time I study English for my IELTS exam we have a lot of friends no I do not have a lot of friends but I have two or three friends that are really close to me and they are like sister to me always they are my partner in crime and spending our time together who is your best friend and why well my best my best friend is moral now we meet each other in high school and unfortunately last year she immigrated to Italy and we could not see each other so our connection is just limited to a video video call and texting that is it and can you tell me with whom would you like to be friends and why well you know the place that I work there is a person that she is really lovely and a heart person sometimes I.

samples.question: Do you think childhood or adulthood is more boring?

samples.question: What do you do when you feel bored?
samples.transcript: Well, I am very outgoing person. So, as for me, I like to go out and meeting my friends and also I like talking with them and yeah, most important thing I really like to eat some delicious food with them. Yeah.
